text: aur jab yoosuph ne unake (galle ka) saamaan duroost kar diya aur vah jaane lage to yoosuf ne (unase kaha) ki (abakee aana to) apane sautele bhaee ko (jise ghar chhod aae ho) mere paas lete aana kya tum nahin dekhate ki mai yaqeenan naap bhee pooree deta hoon aur bahut achchha mehamaan navaaz bhee hoon
